description: This file defines a React-like component (using Qwik framework) named NoteEditor. It handles rendering a form for creating or editing notes, including managing internal state, validation, and calling external save/cancel handlers.

methods.name: onTitleChange$
methods.description: Handles change event for the note title input, updating local state and clearing error message if applicable.

methods.name: onContentChange$
methods.description: Handles change event for the note content textarea, updating local state and clearing error message if applicable.

methods.name: onSubmit$
methods.description: Validates the form fields; if valid, sets a pending save signal with the form data to trigger external save callback.
